# UIUserInterfaceStyle.unspecified

**Case**

An unspecified interface style.

## Declaration

```swift
case unspecified
```

## Discussion

Choose this option when you want to follow the system’s interface style.

## Interface styles

- **UIUserInterfaceStyle.light**: The light interface style.
- **UIUserInterfaceStyle.dark**: The dark interface style.
title: UIUserInterfaceStyle.unspecified
